ADMINISTRATION
Administration
President
Dr. Michael K. Owusu
Dr. Michael Kwaku Agyei Owusu was born and raised in the West African country of Ghana. He has spent 26 of his 31 years in pastoral ministry with the Southeastern Conference of Seventh-day Adventists.
Read More
Executive Secretary
Pierre François
The Office of Southeastern Conference Secretariat oversees and provides services in six key areas to support its mission.
Read More
Treasurer
Emmanuel Charles
The Treasury Department is committed to ensuring God’s money is being used responsibly to support the mission and goals of the Southeastern Conference and the Seventh-day Adventist Church.
Read More

Contact
Contact Us
Call Us
For immediate assistance, call us at
+1 (352) 735-3142
Our lines are open from 8 AM – 6 PM, Monday to Thursday.
Email Us
Send us an email at
+1 (352) 735-3142
communication@secsda.org and our team will get back to you within 24 hours.
Our Location
Use the map to locate us, or get in touch if you need detailed directions. Our team is here to ensure your experience with us is smooth from start to finish.
1701 Robie Ave
Mount Dora, FL 32757
